column4: should this work sudo apt-get install libdvdcss2 ?? it haven't worked for few days now and I really need that in order to watch my dvd's from my dvd-drive
Package libdvdcss2 is not available, but is referred to by another package.
This may mean that the package is missing, has been obsoleted, or
is only available from another source
E: Package libdvdcss2 has no installation candidate
I have a clean hoary install and I need that pack
that package in on the marillat repo
can you tell me the deb url
you need more than just the player
